product_name: Patagonia Thermal Flyer Shirt - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: There's a chill in the air but you'll stay comfortable on your morning run in the Patagonia Thermal Flyer Shirt. The stretch wool fabric gives you a smooth fit and plenty of warmth. Merino wool/polyester/spandex blend is breathable and odor resistant. Shaped cuffs have fold-over mitts to keep your hands warm. Reflective detailing increases your visibility in low light. The Patagonia Thermal Flyer Shirt has a 2-way zipper to let you customize ventilation. Closeout.
short_description: There's a chill in the air but you'll stay comfortable on your morning run in the Patagonia Thermal Flyer Shirt. The stretch wool fabric gives you a smooth fit and plenty of warmth.
